backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the sweet mart backend, defining product, order, user profile, and UPI config types with CRUD operations, access control, delivery assignment, and Stripe/blob-storage integrations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming high-confidence implementation of a back button across relevant frontend pages (Products, Cart, Checkout, etc.), excluding the Home page.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON summaries of all frontend source files, describing each component, hook, and page's purpose and recent changes for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app titled 'Gujrat Sweet Mart and Jalpan Gruh', mounting the app at the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component setting up TanStack Router with all page routes, a sticky navigation header with cart count, admin/delivery role-based links, and a mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Reusable component displaying a centered access-denied message with a shield icon for unauthorized page access attempts.
frontend/src/components/BackButton.tsx: Reusable back button component that calls window.history.back() and is styled with the app's Indian-themed primary color scheme.
frontend/src/components/CartItem.tsx: Cart item component displaying product image, name, quantity (with kg/grams/pieces formatting), price, and a remove button that clears the cart.
frontend/src/components/CustomerInfoForm: A form component for collecting and saving customer delivery information (name, phone, address) with view/edit toggle states, using React Query hooks for persistence and toast notifications for feedback.
frontend/src/components/DeliveryApproval: An admin component that lists pending delivery personnel profiles and allows approving or rejecting them by principal ID, with copy-to-clipboard support for principal IDs.
frontend/src/components/DeliveryStaffMan: An admin form component that grants the delivery role to a user by accepting their principal ID and calling the assign-delivery-role mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/HomepageConfigFo: An admin form for updating homepage configuration including logo image upload (with preview and size validation), business address, hours, and phone number, persisted via a React Query mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A login/logout button component that uses Internet Identity authentication, clearing the React Query cache on logout and handling already-authenticated edge cases.
frontend/src/components/OrdersManagement: An admin component for managing all orders, supporting order status updates, delivery time configuration (with value and time-unit selection), and displaying payment status badges for COD and online payments.
frontend/src/components/OrderTrackingTim: A visual timeline component that displays order progress through stages (placed, shipped, out for delivery, delivered) with responsive desktop and mobile layouts, and a special cancelled state.
frontend/src/components/PaymentMethodSel: React component that renders three payment method options (Cash on Delivery, UPI, Card) as selectable buttons, highlighting the currently selected method.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a single product with image, name, description, price, and controls for selecting weight or quantity, with an add-to-cart button that requires authentication.
frontend/src/components/ProductForm.tsx: Form component for adding or editing a product, handling fields like name, category, price, unit, availability, and image upload with base64 conversion.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Modal dialog that prompts newly authenticated users without a profile to enter their name, then saves it via the user profile mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/StripePaymentSet: Admin component for configuring Stripe payments by entering a secret key and allowed countries, showing a success badge if already configured.
Admin component for configuring UPI payments by entering a UPI ID and uploading a QR code image, with pre-population from existing config.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Provides a `useIsCallerAdmin` hook that queries the backend to check if the current authenticated user is an admin, with retry logic (up to 3 attempts) and verbose debug logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Provides hooks for cart operations: fetching the cart (`useGetCart`), adding items (`useAddToCart`), and clearing the cart (`useClearCart`), each backed by React Query and the canister actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch (`useGetCustomerProfile`) and save (`useSaveCustomerProfile`) a customer's profile via the canister actor, with query invalidation on success.
Provides hooks to fetch pending delivery profiles and approve or reject delivery principal access, showing toast notifications on success or error.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeliveryOrders.ts: Provides hooks to fetch active delivery orders (`useGetActiveOrdersForDelivery`) and update their status (`useUpdateOrderStatusByDelivery`) with toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeliveryRole.ts: Provides hooks to check if the current user is a delivery person (`useIsDeliveryPerson`) and to assign the delivery role to a principal (`useAssignDeliveryRole`).
frontend/src/hooks/useHomepageConfig.ts: Provides hooks to fetch (`useGetHomepageConfig`) and update (`useUpdateHomepageConfig`) the homepage configuration including logo, address, hours, and phone, with toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using `@dfinity/auth-client`, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useMyProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch (`useMyProfile`) and save (`useSaveMyProfile`) the current user's profile, invalidating related queries on successful save.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Provides a comprehensive set of order-related hooks including fetching user and all orders, creating orders, updating status, cancelling, setting delivery time, and marking as paid.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductMutations.t: Provides mutation hooks for product management: adding (`useAddProduct`), editing (`useEditProduct`), and deleting (`useDeleteProduct`) products, each invalidating the products query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: React Query hook to fetch all products from the backend actor, enabled only when the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecurityKey.ts: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeCheckout.ts: React Query mutation hooks for creating a Stripe checkout session, checking if Stripe is configured, and setting Stripe configuration via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpiConfig.ts: React Query hooks to fetch and update UPI payment configuration (UPI ID and QR code) through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks to fetch the current caller's user profile and save/update it via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file setting up Tailwind directives and defining a warm Indian-themed color palette (saffron, marigold, deep red) for both light and dark modes using CSS custom properties.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin panel page with tabs for managing products, orders, Stripe/UPI payment setup, delivery staff, and homepage config; restricted to authenticated admin users.
frontend/src/pages/Cart.tsx: Cart page displaying the user's cart items with an order summary and a button to proceed to checkout; requires login.
frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx: Checkout page that collects customer delivery info and payment method (COD, UPI, or Stripe card), creates an order, and handles payment flow including Stripe redirect.
frontend/src/pages/Delivery.tsx: Delivery dashboard page that shows active orders for delivery personnel, allowing them to mark orders as 'Out for Delivery' or 'Delivered', with access control restricting non-delivery users.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Homepage for Gujrat Sweet Mart displaying a hero banner, business info (address, phone, hours) fetched from backend config with fallback defaults, and a link to the products page.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrders.tsx: User orders page that lists all orders with status badges, order tracking timeline, and the ability to cancel orders that are in 'orderPlaced' or 'shipped' status.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmation.tsx: Order confirmation page that displays order details after placement, including items, delivery time, and UPI payment instructions with a copy-to-clipboard UPI ID feature for online orders.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Static payment failure page shown when a payment is not completed, with links to go home or return to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Payment success page that verifies a Stripe session on load, marks the corresponding order as paid via the backend, and displays success or error states accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/Products.tsx: Products page that fetches and displays all products grouped by category (sweets, snacks, namkeen, beverages) with search filtering, fuzzy suggestions via Levenshtein distance, and scroll-to-category support via URL params.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: User profile page allowing authenticated users to view and edit their name, contact, and email, and displays their delivery approval status badge.
frontend/src/utils/levenshtein.ts: Provides a Levenshtein edit-distance function and a closestMatch helper that returns the best-matching string from a list of candidates for fuzzy search suggestions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based color tokens, typography/display font families, border radii, shadows, and accordion animations for the app's Indian-themed design system.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for Gujarat Sweet Mart tracking schema version, existing features, and a pending feature request to add a back button to relevant pages.
